title: Chocolate Mint Squares
ingredients: ['110g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '450g chocolate sauce', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '250g icing sugar', '110g butter', '4 tablespoons creme de menthe liqueur', '170g plain chocolate chips', '90g butter']
